question: Which of the following places were also called as Mahodaya during the early medieval period?
explanation: Mihir Bhoja who ruled from 836 C.E. to 885 C.E. had his capital at Kannauj. It was also called Mahodaya. In one of the earliest inscriptions of Mihir Bhoja, the Barah copper plate inscription, there is mention of a military campÂ at Mahodaya.
